name: Neyney Royal
description:
Neyney royal is a multiplayer lan game where players face eachothers in a minimalistic atmosphere with no mercy, alot will drop in but only one will be the winner of the Neyney Royal!

gameplay preview:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5LUGaMLxdg0

how to play:

one of the players should click on "Host" and the second one "Join" then type the host's IP adresse, if anything goes wrong or the game is ended press Escape button to reset the game ( don't forget to run as admin and allow network access ), ps: you can run two instances in the same computer and try the multiplayer using the local adress 127.0.0.1

move with the arrow keys or WASD, use the mouse to aim, left click to shoot and left hold to charge a powerful shot, right click to build a wall

don't forget keep track on your mana and health!
